content: this fun project is a great introduction to pineapple lace crochet worked in a worsted weight kitchen cotton with only two repeats the pineapple motifs seem to grow right before your very eyes this can be made in an afternoon and taken for a hike the same day **this pattern was part of a live demo for the creative crochet corner the pattern is free when signing up for the creative crochet corner newsletter 1 a replay of the live demonstration is available for anyone to watch over here on the creative crochet corner website 2 or over here on you tube 3 ** 1 https //go creativecrochetcorner com/a39699/ 2 https //www creativecrochetcorner com/video/pineapple-water-sling-live-tutorial-with-brenda-k-b-anderson/ 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=7s0bfjm8h5s&t=256s
